body:
I don't understand the logic here... is this checking if if this is transposed? Because then the condition should be

```
if (r_->stride[0] == 1 && r_->stride[1] == r_size[0])
```

becuse there may be "holes" in the tensor. Same below for `dense`.

Also, everything seems like it has an extra transpose. Does cuSparse expect everything in column-major order?
